General.Name: Uniplus Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Uniplus Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, processing, and trade of various printed circuit boards. It offers laminated multilayer printed circuit boards, basic circuit boards, and copper foil base boards, as well as aluminum substrates and lubricated aluminum covers. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 38-1, Dongyuan Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan
